Author: Appolinaris9
Text: Yes, you are very right of course and I feel quite bad about it because itâ€™s only in heavy restriction times - when I was binging for like a year or trying intuitive eating I actually was the one who wanted to hang out with people more and not isolate myself because I wasnâ€™t so scared of food.  Today I told them I really need to study, but invited them over to my place tonight (also have a lot of junk food that I can offer them so I wonâ€™t binge on it lol), and will do that more often as itâ€™s a safer space for me atm and I still get to see them! Author: ifuckpineapples
Text: I totally get people being inconsiderate of how much time it takes for you to get some place. but consider yourself lucky that you have friends who bed you to hang out so often. I wish any of my friends would ever reach out to me and ask to hang out lol. if I week you I would try and pick a dedicated day of the week to hang out with them, and explain the drive is annoying on days when you're at home. a practical reason is better than saying you don't want to eat
